clients.title: We Recently Updated Our Brand Page
description: You may find the guidelines to use the Justia logo, icon, colors, typography, and the lawyer rating badge on our brand page. If you have obtained a Justia Lawyer Rating, login and go to “Your Justia Rating Badge” when editing your profile, to find usage details. Tips for utilizing the badge are linked from our brand page as well.
